Irina Demerkova

Psychologist Psychotherapist

About Me

I have a basic psychologist degree, a diploma from the Taras Shevchenko National University of Lugansk. A masterâ€™s diploma from the Dal University of Lugansk.

I studied, improving my qualifications in many areas in psychotherapy, as evidenced by certificates and diplomas. I am happy to use this rich experience in therapy and counseling in the structure of Transactional Analysis in compliance with the EATA Code of Ethics and position myself as a psychotherapist working in a transaction-analytical modality.

The main principles in my work are confidentiality, mutual agreement and responsibility with the client about the result of work, relying on the experience and resources of the client, professionalism and goodwill in communication.
